quiz.text: Recently (May 2023), the Department of Pharmaceuticals in association with _________ has organized the 8th International Conference on Pharma and Medical Device Sector at New Delhi.
options: World Health Organization (WHO)
Federation of Indian Chambers of Commerce and Industry (FICCI)
Confederation of Indian Industry (CII)
UNICEF
Pfizer Inc.

quiz.text: What is the function of the Pharmacopoeia Commission for Indian Medicine & Homoeopathy (PCIM&H)?
options: To promote traditional medicine practices in India.
To provide financial support to practitioners of alternative medicine.
To regulate the import and export of Ayurvedic medicines.
To standardize and ensure the quality control of Ayurveda, Siddha, Unani, and Homoeopathic drugs.
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (May 2023), the National Tiger Conservation Authority (NTCA) has constituted a Cheetah Project Steering Committee. Which of the following statements is/are incorrect with regards to Cheetah Project Steering Committee?
options: Dr Rajesh Gopal, Secretary General, Global Tiger Forum is the committee chairperson.
Total members of the committee are 11.
Tenure of the committee is one year.
Objective is to review, progress, monitor and advice on the Cheetah introduction to the Madhya Pradesh Forest Department.
None of the above

quiz.text:
Recently (May 2023), the Union Cabinet chaired by the Prime Minister has approved the City Investments to Innovate, Integrate and Sustain 2.0 (CITIIS 2.0). Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to CITIIS 2.0?

1.      CITIIS 2.0 is a program conceived by the Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs (MoHUA).

2.      MoHUA has partnered with French Development Agency (AFD), Kreditanstalt für Wiederaufbau (KfW), the European Union (EU), and National Institute of Urban Affairs (NIUA).

3.      The program will run for a period of five years (from 2023 till 2028).

4.      The funding for CITIIS 2.0 would include a loan of Rs.1760 crore (EUR 200 million) from AFD and KfW (EUR 100 million each).
options: 1, 2 and 4
3 and 4
2 and 4
1, 2 and 3
2, 3 and 4

quiz.text: Recently (May 2023), the National Campaign for Updation and Verification of People’s Biodiversity Register (PBR) has been launched in ________, thereby marking a significant step towards the documentation and preservation of India's rich biological diversity.
options: Andaman & Nicobar Islands
Lakshadweep
Kerala
Goa
Arunachal Pradesh

quiz.text: Recently (May 2023), the 3rd Environment and Climate Sustainability Working Group (ECSWG) meeting under India’s G20 Presidency has been held in Mumbai. The 3rd ECSWG was focused on which of the following themes? 1.   Blue Economy 2.   Arresting land degradation 3.      Promoting circular economy
options: 1 and 2
2 and 3
1 only
2 only
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are incorrect with regards to REWARD program?

1.      It is a joint initiative of the Department of Land Resources, Ministry of Rural Development in association with UN Development Programme.

2.      Tenure of the programme is 2021 to 2028.

3.      Funding pattern is 60:40, between UNDP and States.
options: 1 only
2 only
1 and 3
3 only
All of the above

quiz.text: Recently (May 2023), the Tele-Law programe has achieved a new milestone with 40 Lakh beneficiaries across the country having been empowered with pre-litigation advice. Which of the following statements is/are incorrect with regards to Tele-law?
options: It was launched in 2017.
It is an e-interface mechanism to seek legal advice and consultation at a pre-litigation stage.
Advice is free of Cost to those who are eligible for free legal aid under Section 12 of LSA (legal service authority) Act, 1987.
All of the above
None of the above

quiz.text:
Recently (May 2023), National Workshop on National e-Vidhan Application (NeVA) has been held in New Delhi. Which of the following statements is/are incorrect with regards to NeVA?

1.      NeVA has been launched under the aegis of Ministry of Home Affairs.

2.      It is to be implemented in all states except Union Territories.

3.      Tech companies involved in making NeVA are Infosys and TCS.
options: 2 only
1 and 2
2 and 3
1 and 3
All of the above

quiz.text: Recently (May 2023), Rural Development minister has launched SAMARTH campaign to promote _________ at Gram Panchayat level.
options: Digital Transactions
Financial Inclusion of women
Organic Farming
Menstrual Hygiene
Education for Girls

quiz.text: Census 2021 which is to be conducted electronically will include more than _______ parameters of socio-economic status.
options: 15
21
27
35
60

quiz.text: Recently (May 2023), new skilled pathway named MATES (Mobility Arrangement for Talented Early Professionals Scheme) has been specifically created for India by _____________.
options: Germany
France
United Kingdom
Japan
Australia

quiz.text: Recently (May 2023), 2nd Indo-Pacific Economic Framework for Prosperity (IPEF) Ministerial Meeting has been held in Detroit, USA. Which of the following statements is/are incorrect with regards to IPEF?
options: IPEF has 4 pillars.
IPEF has 29 partner countries.
IPEF partners are not required to join all 4 pillars.
India had joined Pillars II to IV of IPEF while it has an observer status in Pillar-I.
None of the above

quiz.text: Rule _________ of the Income-tax Rules, 1962, prescribes valuation methods to determine the Fair Market Value (FMV) of assets, including shares of an unlisted company.
options: 11UA
14UA
17UA
21UA
28UA

quiz.text: The threshold limit for startups eligible for angel tax exemption has been raised from INR 10 crore to _________.
options: INR 25 crore
INR 15 crore
INR 50 crore
INR 20 crore
INR 30 crore

quiz.text: Which of the following statements best defines the term ‘Revenue receipts’?
options: receipts that do not create any liabilities and do not lead to a claim on the government.
recurring income that is earned from sources other than taxes by the government.
receipts that results in the creation of liabilities or the reduction of financial assets.
sum of all receipts from the taxes and all other duties under the government.
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (May 2023), sixth phase of Sagar Parikarma Yatra has been launched in which of the following places?
options: Andaman & Nicobar Islands
Lakshadweep
Odisha
West Bengal
Andhra Pradesh

quiz.text: Recently (May 2023), Union Finance and Corporate Affairs Minister, Smt. Nirmala Sitharaman has stated that “FIRE Corridors” will ignite industrialization & economic development in India. What does ‘E’ in FIRE stands for?
options: Export
Expressways
Engineering
Electrical
Engine

quiz.text: Recently (May 2023), Government has launched the ERSO Pilot initiative to validate certain transformational policy and process changes to make India the Repair Capital of the World. Which of the following statements is/are incorrect with regards to ERSO initiative?
options: ERSO stands for ‘Electronics Repair Services Operations’.
The initiative targets to capture 20% of the global repair service market within five years.
The pilot is being held in Bengaluru, for a period of three months.
The repaired goods will not be permitted to be sold in the domestic market.
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (May 2023), the University Grants Commission (UGC) has announced a new initiative ‘NEP SAARTHI’. Under the initiative Higher Educational Institutions (HEIs) are requested to nominate _________ students from their institutions as NEP SAARTHIs.
options: twenty-five
ten
twenty
three
seven

quiz.text: What is the significance of the recent rule announced by the Union Ministry of Finance regarding courses offered by foreign institutions in International Financial Services Centres (IFSCs)?
options: It allows foreign institutions to operate in IFSCs without any regulatory oversight.
It grants accreditation to courses offered by foreign institutions in IFSCs.
It exempts courses offered by foreign institutions in IFSCs from certain provisions of the University Grants Commission Act and the All-India Council for Technical Education Act.
It restricts the enrollment of Indian students in courses offered by foreign institutions in IFSCs.
It requires foreign institutions to obtain special permission to offer courses in IFSCs.

quiz.text: Recently (May 2023), the _________ has approved a new global tracker for greenhouse gas emissions- Global GHG Watch.
options: World Health Organization (WHO)
UNDP
UNEP
International Energy Agency (IEA)
World Meteorological Organization (WMO)

quiz.text: According to the latest data released by the Controller General of Accounts (CGA), fiscal deficit of the Government of India has narrowed to Rs 17.33 trillion or 6.4% of GDP for FY23. India has set a target to further narrow the deficit for 2023-24 to ______.
options: 6.2%
5.9%
6.1%
6.0%
5.6%

quiz.text: Recently (May 2023), __________ has rolled out its ‘India Country Partnership Strategy (CPS) 2023-27: Catalyze Robust, Climate resilient, and inclusive growth’.
options: World Bank
Asian Development Bank
UN Environment Programme
UN Development Programme
World Health Organization

quiz.text: 3rd G20 Tourism Working Group meeting has been held in which of the following places?
options: Goa
Srinagar, J&K
Leh, Ladakh
Gangtok, Sikkim
Tawang, Arunachal Pradesh
